issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
h4.NOTE: This issue was seen once & was not reproducible again. Opening this ticket case just in case we see this issue later.

h5. Description:
1. Create a normal 2 tabbed app.
2. Build & run it on an android device.
3. Look at the studio logs. After 30 seconds the app will send you the analytics events.

h5. Actual Result:
1. We get error regarding analytics in the studio logs:
{code}
INFO] :   SELinux: Function: selinux_android_load_priority [0], There is no sepolicy file.
[ERROR] :  dalvikvm: >>>>> Normal User
[INFO] :   SELinux:
[INFO] :   SELinux: Function: selinux_android_load_priority [1], There is no sepolicy version file.
[INFO] :   SELinux:
[INFO] :   SELinux: Function: selinux_android_load_priority , priority version is VE=SEPF_SM-G900H_4.4.2_0011
[INFO] :   SELinux:
[INFO] :   SELinux:
